Game.Name: EA Hockey (Europe)
Game.plot: The only game to score with the NHL! Includes all 22 NHL teams and two All-Star teams - each skater modeled on 14 different attributes, such as scoring, skating, aggression, and rink awareness. All the fast-paced action of real hockey - superior skating, body checks, and ballistic slap shots. Watch out! Slashing, holding, and tripping will earn you some time in the penalty box - if the ref sees you! Slip one past the goalie and you light up the board - it takes sharp skills and skates to succeed in this league! This game has all the details down, including instant replay, scouting reports, realistic sounds - booing, cheering, clapping, and dynamic crowd reactions.Cheat: Championship PasswordsTo get to the championship with any team, enter the following at the passwords screen:Cheat: Championship Passwords To play as the New York Islanders against the San Jose Sharks in the Stanley Cup finals, enter the following at the password screen:Cheat: Championship PasswordsEnter these passwords at the password screen under Continue Playoffs to play as the Rangers in each round of the playoffs.Cheat: Championship PasswordsEnter these at the password screen: Note: The first team listed is the team you will be controllingCheat: Skate Through the StandsBegin a 2-player teammates game. Make sure that the penalites are on. Once your player is found to be an instigator of a fight, move away from the penalty box and proceed to bump the player into the boards. Your player will skate up and into the stands.
